topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559d5bf4636872681a00106f#post_559d5bf4636872681a00106f
Adobe got hacked by some fuckers.

And if you have the earlier versions of Adobe you might risk getting some terrible fucking viruses on your Computer.

Make sure you update your Adobe to version 18.0.0.203 right away!

Also if anything just get rid of Adobe. 

"@HeroInferno":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559d39796368720e150005b6#post_559d39796368720e150005b6
[bq="HeroInferno"]"An update on the current flash situation curtosy of Kirbyfanneox.":http://kirbyfanneox.tumblr.com/post/123551828888/warning-disable-adobe-flash-asap If you are using any of the following, you could be at risk:
    Adobe Flash Player 18.0.0.194 and earlier versions for Windows and Macintosh
    Adobe Flash Player Extended Support Release version 13.0.0.296 and earlier 13.x versions for Windows and Macintosh
    Adobe Flash Player 11.2.202.468 and earlier 11.x versions for Linux

Chrom users should be fine as version 18.0.0.203 seems to have been sent out, Firefox users may have to manually update their version.[/bq]
